question: It is a hybrid variety of a fruit that has been developed and is cultivated in Chhattisgarh. It weighs up to one kilogram. It has been termed as “VNR Bihi”. It is a combination of a variety grown in Thailand and India. Which of the following fruits has been described above?
explanation: “VNR Bihi” is a hybrid variety of guava developed and cultivated in Chhattisgarh. It can weigh up to one kilogram. It is a combination of a variety grown in Thailand and India. The guava variety is highly nutritious and has less seed and thick pulp, and is suitable for long-distance transport and longer shelf life of 15 days.
